Profiler.h

00001 #ifndef _PROFILER_H
00002 #define _PROFILER_H

00005 #include <lang/pp.h>

00007 
00008 #ifndef USE_PROFILING
00009     #include <lang/string.h>
00010     BEGIN_NAMESPACE(lang) 
00011         class Profiler
00012         { 
00013         public:
00014             Profiler(char* /*sampleName*/){};
00015             ~Profiler(){};
00016             static void start(NS(lang,String) /*fileName*/){};
00017             static void stop(){};
00018             static void output(){};
00019             static void setTestCaseName(const char* /*name*/){};
00020             static const char* getTestCaseName() { return "Profiler disabled"; }
00021         };
00022     END_NAMESPACE()
00023     #define PRF(x)
00024 #else
00025 
00026 
00027 #include <time.h>
00028 #include <lang/pp.h>
00029 #include <lang/assert.h>
00030 #include <lang/string.h>
00031 
00032 #define MAX_PROFILER_SAMPLES 30
00033 #define MAX_PROFILER_LINELENGTH 200
00034 
00035 #if defined(PLATFORM_NGI)
00036 #   include <runtime.h>
00037 #   include <performancetiming.h>
00038 #elif defined(PLATFORM_WIN32)
00039 #   define NOMINMAX
00040 #   include <windows.h>
00041 #endif
00042 
00043 BEGIN_NAMESPACE(io) 
00044     class FileOutputStream;
00045 END_NAMESPACE()
00046 
00047 BEGIN_NAMESPACE(lang) 
00048 
00049 class Profiler
00050 {
00051 public:
00052     Profiler(char* sampleName);
00053     ~Profiler();
00054     static void start(NS(lang,String) fileName = "");
00055     static void stop();
00056     static void output() {sm_outputRequested = true;}
00057     static void setTestCaseName(const char* name);
00058     static const char* getTestCaseName() { return sm_testCaseName; }
00059 
00060 private:
00061     static void resetAll();
00062     static void frameBegin(unsigned long counter);
00063     static void frameEnd(unsigned long long counter);
00064     static void printLine( const char* fmt, ... );
00065     static void printSample_r(int id);
00066     static void doOutput();
00067 
00068     static inline unsigned long getFrequency()
00069     {
00070         assert( sm_instantiated && "Profiler not started.");
00071         return sm_frequency;
00072     }
00073 
00074     static inline unsigned long getTime_ns()
00075     {
00076         assert( sm_instantiated && "Profiler not started.");
00077         #if defined(PLATFORM_NGI)
00078             return sm_performanceTiming->GetHighPrecisionTime();
00079         #elif defined(PLATFORM_WIN32)
00080             LARGE_INTEGER freq;
00081             int err = QueryPerformanceFrequency(&freq);
00082             assert( err );
00083 
00084             LARGE_INTEGER cur;
00085             err = QueryPerformanceCounter( &cur );
00086             assert( err );
00087 
00088             double nsdiv = double(freq.LowPart) / double(1000000000.0);
00089             double ns = double(cur.LowPart) / nsdiv;
00090             return (unsigned long)ns;
00091 
00092         #else
00093             return 1;
00094         #endif
00095     }
00096 
00097     static bool sm_instantiated;
00098     static unsigned long sm_frequency; // Hz
00099     static char* sm_testCaseName;
00100     static NS(io,FileOutputStream)* sm_logFile;
00101     static char sm_messageBuffer[(MAX_PROFILER_SAMPLES + 6) * MAX_PROFILER_LINELENGTH];
00102 
00103     int m_sampleIndex;
00104 
00105     static int sm_lastOpenedSample;
00106     static int sm_openSampleCount;
00107     
00108     static unsigned long long   sm_rootFrameBegin;
00109     static unsigned long long   sm_rootFrameEnd;
00110     static unsigned long long   sm_periodTime;
00111     static time_t               sm_frameTimeStamp;
00112     static unsigned int         sm_validFrameCount;
00113     static unsigned int         sm_invalidFrameCount;
00114 
00115     static bool                 sm_outputRequested;
00116 
00117     static struct ProfilerSample
00118     {
00119         ProfilerSample()
00120         {
00121           bIsValid=false; 
00122           minPc=maxPc=-1;
00123           name = "unused";
00124         }
00125 
00126         bool bIsValid;    //whether or not this sample is valid to be used
00127         bool bIsOpen;     //is this sample currently being profiled?
00128         char* name; //name of the sample
00129         
00130         unsigned int frameCallCount; //number of times this sample has been executed
00131         unsigned int periodCallCount; //number of times this sample has been executed
00132 
00133         unsigned long frameStartTime;  //starting time on the clock
00134         unsigned long long frameTotalTime;  //total time recorded across all executions of this sample
00135         unsigned long long frameChildTime;  //total time taken by children of this sample
00136         
00137         unsigned long long periodTotalTime;  //total time recorded across all executions of this sample
00138         unsigned long long periodChildTime;  //total time taken by children of this sample
00139 
00140         // Output formatting helpers
00141         int parentCount;    // number of parents this sample has (last frame)   
00142         int parentId;       // ID of parent sample (last frame)
00143 
00144         float minPc;      //minimum percentage of game loop time taken up
00145         float maxPc;      //maximum percentage of game loop time taken up
00146 
00147     } sm_samples[MAX_PROFILER_SAMPLES];
00148     
00149 #if defined(PLATFORM_NGI)
00150     static NS(ngi,IPerformanceTiming)* sm_performanceTiming;
00151 #endif
00152 };
00153 
00154 END_NAMESPACE()
00155 
00156 #define PRF(x) NS(lang,Profiler) prf_ ## __LINE__ = NS(lang,Profiler)(x);

00158 
00159 #endif // USE_PROFILING
